identity.description: The identity of the cluster, if configured.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

name.description: The name of the Kusto cluster.

zones.description: The availability zones of the cluster.

name.description: The name of the attached database configuration.

properties.description: The properties of the attached database configuration.

name.description: The name of the database in the Kusto cluster.
The name of the data connection.
The name of the Kusto principalAssignment.
The name of the Kusto database script.
The name of the managed private endpoint.
The name of the Kusto principalAssignment.
The name of the private endpoint connection.
The data connection name

AcceptedAudiences.description: Represents an accepted audience trusted by the cluster.

value.description: GUID or valid URL representing an accepted audience.

AttachedDatabaseConfigurationProperties.description: Class representing the an attached database configuration properties of kind specific.

clusterResourceId.description: The resource id of the cluster where the databases you would like to attach reside.

databaseName.description: The name of the database which you would like to attach, use * if you want to follow all current and future databases.

capacity.description: The number of instances of the cluster.

name.description: SKU name.

ClusterPrincipalProperties.description: A class representing cluster principal property.

principalId.description: The principal ID assigned to the cluster principal. It can be a user email, application ID, or security group name.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the principal

ClusterProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto cluster properties.

allowedFqdnList.description: List of allowed FQDNs(Fully Qualified Domain Name) for egress from Cluster.

allowedIpRangeList.description: The list of ips in the format of CIDR allowed to connect to the cluster.

enableAutoStop.description: A boolean value that indicates if the cluster could be automatically stopped (due to lack of data or no activity for many days).

enableDiskEncryption.description: A boolean value that indicates if the cluster's disks are encrypted.

enableDoubleEncryption.description: A boolean value that indicates if double encryption is enabled.

enablePurge.description: A boolean value that indicates if the purge operations are enabled.

enableStreamingIngest.description: A boolean value that indicates if the streaming ingest is enabled.

keyVaultProperties.description: KeyVault properties for the cluster encryption.

publicIPType.description: Indicates what public IP type to create - IPv4 (default), or DualStack (both IPv4 and IPv6)

publicNetworkAccess.description: Public network access to the cluster is enabled by default. When disabled, only private endpoint connection to the cluster is allowed

restrictOutboundNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not to restrict outbound network access.  Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

DatabasePrincipalProperties.description: A class representing database principal property.

principalId.description: The principal ID assigned to the database principal. It can be a user email, application ID, or security group name.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the principal

type.description: The type of managed identity used. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user-assigned identities. The type 'None' will remove all identities.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user identities associated with the Kusto cluster. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

keyName.description: The name of the key vault key.

keyVaultUri.description: The Uri of the key vault.

keyVersion.description: The version of the key vault key.

userIdentity.description: The user assigned identity (ARM resource id) that has access to the key.

ManagedPrivateEndpointProperties.description: A class representing the properties of a managed private endpoint object.

groupId.description: The groupId in which the managed private endpoint is created.

privateLinkResourceId.description: The ARM resource ID of the resource for which the managed private endpoint is created.

privateLinkResourceRegion.description: The region of the resource to which the managed private endpoint is created.

OptimizedAutoscale.description: A class that contains the optimized auto scale definition.

isEnabled.description: A boolean value that indicate if the optimized autoscale feature is enabled or not.

version.description: The version of the template defined, for instance 1.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: Properties of a private endpoint connection.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: Connection State of the Private Endpoint Connection.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionStatePropert.description: Connection State of the Private Endpoint Connection.

description.description: The private link service connection description.

status.description: The private link service connection status.

ScriptProperties.description: A class representing database script property.

continueOnErrors.description: Flag that indicates whether to continue if one of the command fails.

forceUpdateTag.description: A unique string. If changed the script will be applied again.

scriptContent.description: The script content. This property should be used when the script is provide inline and not through file in a SA. Must not be used together with scriptUrl and scriptUrlSasToken properties.

scriptUrl.description: The url to the KQL script blob file. Must not be used together with scriptContent property

scriptUrlSasToken.description: The SaS token that provide read access to the file which contain the script. Must be provided when using scriptUrl property.

TableLevelSharingProperties.description: Tables that will be included and excluded in the follower database

externalTablesToExclude.description: List of external tables exclude from the follower database

externalTablesToInclude.description: List of external tables to include in the follower database

materializedViewsToExclude.description: List of materialized views exclude from the follower database

materializedViewsToInclude.description: List of materialized views to include in the follower database

tablesToExclude.description: List of tables to exclude from the follower database

tablesToInclude.description: List of tables to include in the follower database

TrustedExternalTenant.description: Represents a tenant ID that is trusted by the cluster.

VirtualNetworkConfiguration.description: A class that contains virtual network definition.

dataManagementPublicIpId.description: Data management's service public IP address resource id.

enginePublicIpId.description: Engine service's public IP address resource id.

name.description: The name of the attached database configuration.

properties.description: The properties of the attached database configuration.

name.description: The name of the database in the Kusto cluster.
The name of the data connection.
The name of the Kusto principalAssignment.
The name of the Kusto database script.
The name of the managed private endpoint.
The name of the Kusto principalAssignment.
The name of the private endpoint connection.
The data connection name

genevaEnvironment.description: The Geneva environment of the geneva data connection.

GenevaDataConnectionProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto Geneva (GDS) connection properties.

GenevaDataConnection.description: Information about the Geneva (GDS) data connection

genevaEnvironment.description: The Geneva environment of the geneva data connection.

mdsAccounts.description: The list of mds accounts of the geneva data connection.

isScrubbed.description: Indicates whether the data is scrubbed.

GenevaLegacyDataConnectionProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto Geneva legacy connection properties.

GenevaLegacyDataConnection.description: Information about the Geneva legacy data connection.
